title: Leal
body: It is an ancient family name, mainly in Porto da Cruz. Antonio de Almada married Isabel Rodrigues Leal from this parish around the mid-16th century. In 1684, Maria de Aguiar, widow of Gonçalo de Faria Leal, established the chapel of Nossa Senhora do Socorro in Estreito de Câmara de Lobos. A member of this family, named João Nepomuceno de Freitas Leal, founded a chapel dedicated to S. João Nepomuceno in 1770 in the place of Lombo dos Leais, in the mentioned parish of Porto da Cruz.
